name: Gray
description: The signature theme with a grey background and white gridlines, designed to put the data forward yet make comparisons easy.

name: Black&White
description: The classic dark-on-light theme. May work better for presentations displayed with a projector.

name: Line Draw
description: A theme with only black lines of various widths on white backgrounds, reminiscent of a line drawings. Serves a purpose similar to bw. Note that this theme has some very thin lines (<< 1 pt) which some journals may refuse.

name: Light
description: A theme similar to linedraw but with light grey lines and axes, to direct more attention towards the data.

name: Dark
description: The dark cousin of light, with similar line sizes but a dark background. Useful to make thin coloured lines pop out.

name: Minimal
description: A minimalistic theme with no background annotations.

name: Classic
description: A classic-looking theme, with x and y axis lines and no gridlines.
